description:
Thank you news dot com. 🙏❤️🌈
Evans ended the post saying, “I send love to you all, regardless of what your beliefs are. #healthfreedom”. Earlier this month the government introduced new rules that stipulate visitors to aged care homes across Australia will need to have had a flu vaccination to enter.

The petition, which has more than 12,300 signatures, says the medication has not been tested for the potential to cause cancer, genetic mutations, and fertility impairment.
